Uses of Interface
edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActionInterface

    edu.monash.fit2099.engine

    • Uses of ActionInterface in edu.monash.fit2099.engine

      Classes in edu.monash.fit2099.engine that implement ActionInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Action
      Base class for Actions.
      class  DoNothingAction
      An Action that doesn't do anything.
      class  DropItemAction
      Special Action that allows Actors to drop items.
      class  MoveActorAction
      An Action that moves the Actor.
      class  PickUpItemAction
      Action to allow items to be picked up.

    • Uses of ActionInterface in game

      Classes in game that implement ActionInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AimingAction
      A class which represents action to aim at a target.
      class  AttackAction
      Special Action for attacking other Actors.
      class  ChantingAction
      Represents the chanting action of priestess, Mambo Marie.
      class  CraftWeaponAction
      A class which represents action for crafting zombie arm or leg into club or mace.
      class  EatingAction
      A class which represents an action to eat food.
      class  FertiliseAction
      Special class for FertiliseAction so that the Farmer can fertilise an unripe crop and shorten the time needed for crop to ripe.
      class  GrowlAction
      Special action for Zombie to growl, i.e.
      class  HarvestAction
      Special action for Farmer and Player to harvest ripe crops.
      class  HumanAttackAction
      Special class which represents action taken by alive actors (Human/Player) to attack undead actor or priestess (Zombie/Mambo Marie).
      class  QuitGameAction
      Special class for Player to quit the game voluntarily.
      class  RefillBulletAction
      A class which represents an action to refill bullets of a weapon.
      class  ShootingAction
      A class which represents shooting action which allows player to choose shooting direction from a sub menu and results in area effect damage to more than one target based on specific miss chance.
      class  SnippingAction
      A class which represents sniping action which perform attack to specific target using specific miss chance and damage.
      class  SowingAction
      Special class for the Farmer to sow a crop.
      class  TravelAction
      Represents the Player’s action to travel between the compound map and town map.
      class  UseSniperAction
      A class which represents action for an actor to use a sniper rifle, by providing a sub menu for actor to choose a target from the actor's current map and after choosing a target, provide another sub menu for actor to choose action to perform on the target, either aiming at target or shoot at target.
      class  ZombieAttackAction
      Special class which represents action taken by undead actor or priestess (Zombie/Mambo Marie) to attack alive actors (Human/Player) .
